name: velte
description: A light(5kb), performant, easy-to-use Frontend library for Modern Apps.

scripts.dev:build:module: rollup src/velte.js -f es --exports named -n velte -o node_package/velte.es.js
scripts.dev:build:main: rollup src/velte.js -f umd --exports named -n velte -o node_package/velte.umd.js

author: Emmanuel Oni
